name: Daniel B. AHLBORN, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH Of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 473 Western District Allocatur Docket 1993

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Daniel B. AHLBORN, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH Of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition for allowance of appeal is granted and the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed and the 90 day suspension of operating privileges issued by the Department of Transportation is reinstated. Commonwealth v. Duffey, 536 Pa. 436, 639 A.2d 1174 (1994).
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
641 A.2d 1166
Daniel B. AHLBORN, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH Of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 8, 1994.
